title: Indonesian Distance Self-Directed Learning Project-Based Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Project Execution Using Digital Environments (PC/Tablet) and Peer Feedback System Construction

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret Indonesian work-related documents with at least 80% accuracy
Learners complete role-play projects for job-specific scenarios in Indonesian with at least 70% proficiency and pass peer evaluations
Learners autonomously develop study plans and achieve at least 90% attendance over eight weeks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
